Paṭṭoli，in yāna° at Vism．328 is doubtful．It might be read as yāna-kaḷopi （on account of comb<sup>n</sup> with kumbhimukha），or （preferably） as putoḷi （with v．l．BB），which is a regular variant for mutoli．The trsl<sup>n</sup> would be “provision bag for a carriage．” See further discussed under mutoḷi．（Page 402）
